snippet.title: Ratopia Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
New game with combined genre of strategic survival, Sandbox, and city building simulation.
Enjoy the simulation with vast world to adventure with a great number of contents.
Build your own economical system to sustain your ideal city of Ratopia.

Add to steam wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244130/Ratopia/

Homepage - http://www.casselgames.com/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CasselGames/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CasselGames
